alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Highlands, eastern Charlotte, southeastern DeSoto and north central Lee Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Venus to near Babcock Webb Wma. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Babcock Webb Wma, Venus, Babcock Ranch, Archbold, Brighton, Placid Lakes and North Fort Myers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
